metadata.title: CVE-2021-40565 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description: A Segmentation fault caused by a null pointer dereference vulnerability exists in Gpac through 1.0.1 via the gf_avc_parse_nalu function in av_parsers.c when using mp4box, which causes a denial of service.

criterions.comment: gpac package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
